arabic_text: وَٱلَّذِينَ جَٰهَدُواْ فِينَا لَنَهۡدِيَنَّهُمۡ سُبُلَنَاۚ وَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَمَعَ ٱلۡمُحۡسِنِينَ
translation: As for those who strive in Our cause, We will surely guide them to Our ways[22], for Allah is certainly with those who do good.
footnotes: [22] i.e., various ways and means of attaining Allah’s pleasure.
